text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion

Everyone, great job on wrapping up!
Seems like the broadcast was well-received...!

We've been getting positive reactions on SNS too...
It's like exploring another potential side of L'Antica.
Ah, it's all thanks to everyone's hard work in acting.

...But exploring another potential side of L'Antica?
The roles really suited everyone...

Indeed, even in casual conversations,
we'd naturally say things like this.

Some parts were based on our input,
while others were entrusted to the scriptwriters.

That's right!
We could act pretty naturally, huh?

Of course, there were differences...
But overall, it was like, "Oh, that's Mitsumine!"

Haha, yeah.
It felt like us, but not entirely us.
It was definitely a scene that left us feeling peculiar.
Anyway, it's over smoothly, so...
Isn't that great?

"Hitotoki" is... mysterious...
but warm place.

When we're all together...
anywhere becomes like L'Antica...

Everyone~! It's done~!
Espuma shaved ice~!!

I'm not sure if it tastes the same as during filming...
but let's enjoy it slowly today~!
Haha, Kogane is still the same.
Huh? What are you talking about~?

It's about Kogane being the manager of "Hitotoki"...
...Oh, so this is the rumored espuma...!
Let's dig in──!!
